Nightlight:

Nightlight ran in every room of the base, looking for Elita or Rodimus. 
While she was doing that she started to track her daughter, but she couldnt 
pick up her signature, then she tried to Track Rodimu's signature.

-----Mensaje original----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Friday, August 12, 2011 3:56 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Nightmares . . .

> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight looked around she was scared and the feeling that something
> terrible woul happen didnt leat her; she looked around and dint see Elita
> around she said trying to contain her fear "Where's Elita???.... Where is
> Rodimus???? Something bad will happen where are they???"

<NEW>

There was a pause from BUMP as he showed a rare emotion, sheepishness.
"I . . . I um . . . I think that Nightshift . . . that is to say that,
Nightshift took Elita somewhere, I am not sure exactly where." He
smiled, another thing that BUMP rarely did, "But I am sure that
everything is alright."

Clearing his throat, "I think I will go to my lab now." BUMP began to
retreat from the room obviously uncomfortable.

(TAG)

Preston
